manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: In search of high-quality replacement mop pads? Mop pads that work as good as the original to allow you efficient washing & rotation? The Flammi replacement mop pads are it. These replacement pads are ideal for Shark S1000 Steam Mop series. Designed to perfectly fit & give you the same cleaning power as when you first bought your steam mop device, you can truly upgrade your cleaning with ease! This set of 4 Flammi replacement mop pads gives you: - Strong water absorption and fast dry properties - Scrubbing strips for tough, stickier messes without scratch or smear floor surfaces - Cleaning for all hard floors: wooden floors, ceramic tile, laminate floors, marble floors - They are reusable and machine washable - Get 4pcs mop pad for extra use, save your money, give you a comfortable house Basic Information: - Materials: Microfiber(80% Polyester/20% Polyamide) - Product Dimensions: 12.5 x 6.5 inches - Compatible with: Shark Dirt Grip Steam Mop S1000 S1000A S1000C S1000WM S1001C; Model #: P1000C5

Pet-Friendly Cleaning The Dirt Grip Mop Pad helps remove dried-on pet messes faster and easier. Steam-clean use only water. No harsh chemicals need. For All Hard Floors Use on sealed hardwood, ceramic, linoleum, tile, granite, and marble floors. Save Money & Save Time The steamer pads are machine washable for repeated use.
✓ By Flammi – Make Cleaning easier Need Any Other Steam Mop Replacement Pads? Search "Flammi Steam Mop Replacement Pads" to Check Out !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Steamer - durable pads
reviews.reviewText: This really will be more of a review for the Shark Steamer, but the pads are an important part of its greatness!This is amazing, lightweight, affordable and easy to use. The water tank lasts forever, and there had been no problem with build up using tap water.The pads are very durable and easy to clean. You will want to buy extra because this cleans so well you won't want to stop for a dirty pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than ordinary pads
reviews.reviewText: Works to remove debris and scrubs as it cleans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as described, the perfect part.
reviews.reviewText: This product is not carried in the store where I bought the steamer. I was glad to find a 4 pack at a reasonable price that is a good quality. Fast shipping too. I will definitely purchase here again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product! The pads are easy to exchange and they wash great! They perform well and they look great on the steamer! I use my steamer and the pads once every week and have never been disappointed !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: High quality that last after many uses and they wash up perfectly…good as new!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They fit perfectly and they work wonderfully I would highly recommend buying from this company again.

reviews.reviewText: Love these pads for my steamer. The extra scrubby areas on them work well, and I like the texture, they hardly leave any streaks.
Llegaron muy pronto son de buena calidad iguales a las que trae la trampeadora al momento de la compra
I ordered from another seller but it was sent somewhere else. I had to reorder these and they came quickly without problems. Haven't tried them yet.
Muy buenos repuestos pero no excelentes.Mas delgados que los originales pero cumplen su funcion.
